 [‹ Looking for fonts similar to the Twix logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045616/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16744 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) geometric sans w/ slanted e and UC ligatures - ITC Avant Garde Gothic w/ Alternates {Lauren} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080408045616/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16649 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bessd1

comments.content: It looks like Optima to me, with some customized characters.
I’m not so sure about that. Don’t you have a clearer sample, Bess?

I think Chris was right - other than the ’A’s, ’R’s, and Ampersand, it appears to be Optima Bold and Optima.

- Lex
